Container.Name: rundeck
Container.Overview: Avoid interruptions! Self service with Rundeck! Converted By Community Applications Always verify this template (and values) against the dockerhub support page for the container

Config.Name: Web UI
Config.Description: Port where the Rundeck web UI is hosted

Config.Name: RUNDECK_GRAILS_URL
Config.Description: Controls the base URL the app will use for links, redirects, etc. This is the URL users will use to access the site.
